divs: sighting detailsï»¿these things are surfing through your skies. they are soooooo prevalent, i could video 100 of them in a few hours. if it is clear, they are flying low. if it is cloudy, they fly high. they used to be discs, now they have done a change up. your government cares so much about you, they don't want to scare you with the truth. isn't that considerate of them? the truth is coming, and not from the government. keep watching. just because you don't believe, doesn't mean it isn't happenin...i will keep more coming at *(link moved to additional evidence section--cms\sg) on youtube.
